reviewText: I had somewhat low expectations of how a DVD can deliver a comprehensive program for behavioral modification for a parent to use on their child. Wow, I was wrong! The key to any seminar that tries to teach a new set of ideas to implement in one's life or business is a plan that you are able incorporate that is simple and that works. The Three Golden Rules hits the mark for that and more. It is so simple and it can and does work!!! Definitely worth investing in.
